Fortuneteller quickly searches the room for anything
that resembles bugs, then positions herself in a place
where any hidden within the wall would have difficulty
hearing her.  She then pulls out her comminicator, and
relays her entire story back to the Deviners. 
Afterwards, she lays down on her bed and allows
herself to shut down for a while.


--- Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:

> : : Kup : :
> 
> Kup came apon a door and opened it.
> 
> Kup: Here you are. If you need anything just use the
> computer terminal. Now if you'll excuse me.
> 
> Kup heads to the med bay.
> 
> Kup: Whats going on here? How is Nightlight?
> 
> 
> Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@...> wrote:
> Fortuneteller went in the direction Kup indicated.
> 
> --- Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
> 
> > : : Rodimus Prime/Kup : :
> > 
> > Kup returns to the briefing room.
> > 
> > Rodimus: How did it go, old friend?
> > 
> > Kup: I'll never like seeing a femmebot cry. She
> went
> > with Organics to the mess hall.
> > 
> > Rodimus: Would you mind showing Fortuneteller to a
> > free quarters.
> > 
> > Kup: Sure thing, Roddy.
> > 
> > Kup gestures towards the door, allowing
> > Fortuneteller to leave first...
> > 
> > Rodimus returns his attention to Megatron.
> > 
> > Rodimus: Well if there is nothing else to discuss
> at

> as
> > well. The secure areas of the base will be off
> > limits of course. They are all marked. You may
> feel
> > free to walk the base however. The mess hall,
> > holodecks, training room and any other
> recreational
> > activities are at your disposal. Some Maximal
> > hospitality.

> > > Kup looked up, his optics now focusing on the
> > femme.
> > > He saw the pain she was going through and
> watching
> > > it hurt him.
> > > 
> > > He walks closer to her, resting his left hand on
> > her
> > > right shoulder.
> > > 
> > > Kup: Only he knows why he did what he did. I'm
> so
> > > sorry for your loss...
> > > 
> > > At this point he was really at a loss for words.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > Yojinbo of Nightmare <bustercross365@...>
> > > wrote:
> > > Wolfblade:
> > > 
> > > Th femme sat absolutely still for a moment.  She
> > was
> > > wanting to 
> > > distance herself from that bot, but now her
> spark
> > > ached for his 
> > > presense.  She tried to remain calm and
> collected,
> > > but she finally 
> > > broke down.  She dropped he tools, and sobbed
> into
> > > her hands.
> > > "Why... why did he go?  Why did he go with
> them?"
> > > she questioned 
> > > outloud.
> > > 
> > > 
> > >

> > > <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > > > : : Rodimus Prime/Kup : :

> > > I'll take care of it though.

> > long
> > > after Wolfblade.

> > > figure it would be 
> > > better in private rather then up in that
> briefing
> > > room. I could tell 
> > > that you care for Malice. I'm sorry to tell you
> > > this, lass, but 
> > > Malice was captured. He is now one of Unicron's
> > > Minions.
> > > > 
> > > > Kup looks down, his optics closeing with
> > emotion.
> > > He couldn't look 
> > > her streight in the optics. He had never liked
> > > telling bots bad news 
> > > about their loved ones.

> her
> > > body language, how
